item.description:
Hey y'all, I mentioned this to some of you last night, but thought I'd officially set something up. So apparently, nerdnite is a monthly comedy event where "nerds" make a parody of their own research. I figure that if it turns out badly, at least there's alcohol in the lounge =) Hopefully you can make it!

Here's more info on it: http://boston.nerdnit...
item.why: There's no good TV on Monday nights.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Nerdnite!
